About Me

Profile

Electronics and Communication Engineering student with strong skills in embedded systems, robotics, and IoT development. Experienced in real-time microcontrollers and sensor-based automation. Recognized at the e-Yantra Innovation Challenge at IIT Bombay. Passionate about building scalable hardwareâ€“software systems to solve real-world engineering problems.

Summary

Practical experience in autonomous vehicles, biomedical delta robotic arm, and a patented smart acoustic rootworm repellent system. Comfortable with firmware, control algorithm design (PID/LQR), sensor fusion, and hardware interfacing.

Technical Skills

  • Control Systems: PID Control
  • Sensor Fusion: IMU integration, encoders, INS, calibration
  • Robotics & Motion Control: Trajectory planning, actuator control
  • Embedded Systems: C/C++, Arduino, PIC, STM32, ESP32
  • Protocols: UART, I2C, SPI
  • RTOS basics, troubleshooting and debugging
  • Tools: Keil, MPLAB, STM32CubeIDE, Proteus, MATLAB

Robotics & Systems Background

Experience building autonomous systems with sensor fusion, closed-loop control, and embedded communication stacks. Strong emphasis on robust, energy-efficient designs for field deployment.
